page.title: 09Transport(2).
page.content:
A further study of freight timetables showed that{58 freight trains}come through the D-Block each{Wednesday:
Freightliner 10 Speedlink 17 Cars (from Dagenham) 3 Company Trains 8 Mixed Freight 2 Merry-go-Round(coal) 18
The high number of{Merry-go-Round {trains}can be explained by the fact that this part of England has a large amount of{coal mines and power {stations. From a traffic survey carried out on the A638 on a weekday morning it was found that most traffic consisted of {private cars}travelling both north and south.
